subject: Acceptance of ‘Bid Security and Performance Security’ as physical Bank Guarantee till 31.03.2023
text: IRal 77z4 WTHNf gifeazrot (4sv 9Rdev & rTHFf +T4, 4RTT TGFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 87na T 111-5 Q 6, Qa27-10, aRq, 78f @erif 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 THN /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Bank Guarantee/2022 Policy Circular No.3.1.38/ 2022 dated 23rd December , 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. F.NHAI/CGM(F)/e-BG/2022/e-157054-1 (Comp. No.162641)} Sub.: Acceptance of Bid Security and Performance Security' as physical Bank Guarantee till 31.03.2023-reg: NHAI Policy Circular No.3.1.36/2022 dated 05.12.2022 was issued conveying the approval of Competent Authority to accept the Bid Security and Performance Security' in the form of Account Payee Demand Draft, Banker's Cheque or e-Bank Guarantee as per the MoRTH letter No_ NH- 35014/20/2020-H dated 12.08.2022. However, keeping in view the limited number  of banks currently issuing e-BG, it has been decided to accept Bid Security and Performance Security' as physical Bank Guarantee also till 31.03.2023 for all the modes of projects viz. EPC, HAM and BOT(Toll). 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: ae/1l2v (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
